channel.title: Structural Solutions & Smart! - AutoDoor issue
channel.description:
Hi,
I recently installed Structural Solutions (hereafter SS), while already using Smart! for a while. I was testing a bit with new objects from SS and all was going fine till I select the 'AutoDoor Modular', then the game goes back to the Main menu and then crashes.
SF installed via Steam, non-beta, SML updated to 3.1.1, all mods updated. crash report is in the link below. [UE4 - crash report](https://pastebin.com/1SUA2nuF)
Can this be solved? :blush:
